title: Date and Hazelnut Cake with Lemon Icing
ingredients: ['200g (7 oz) stoned dried dates, chopped', '30g (1 oz) butter', '1 tsp bicarbonate of soda', '240ml (8 fl oz) boiling water', '140g (5 oz) light brown soft sugar', '2 eggs', '280g (10 oz) plain flour', '2 tsp baking powder', '1 tsp ground cinnamon', '1/2 tsp ground nutmeg', '1 pinch of salt', '115g (4 oz) hazelnuts, chopped', 'Icing', '55g (2 oz) butter, melted', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 dash vanilla extract', '200g icing sugar']
